00041 enum ECSocketErrors {
00042     EC_ERROR_NOERROR,
00043     EC_ERROR_INVOP,
00044     EC_ERROR_IOERR,
00045     EC_ERROR_INVADDR,
00046     EC_ERROR_INVSOCK,
00047     EC_ERROR_NOHOST,
00048     EC_ERROR_INVPORT,
00049     EC_ERROR_WOULDBLOCK,
00050     EC_ERROR_TIMEDOUT,
00051     EC_ERROR_MEMERR,
00052     EC_ERROR_UNKNOWN
00053 };

00065 class CECSocket{

00067     friend class CECTag;
00068 
00069 private:
00070     static const unsigned int EC_SOCKET_BUFFER_SIZE = 2048;
00071     static const unsigned int EC_HEADER_SIZE = 8;
00072     const bool m_use_events;
00073     
00074     // Output related data
00075     std::list<CQueuedData *> m_output_queue;
00076 
00077     // zlib (deflation) buffers

00079     std::vector<unsigned char> m_out_ptr;

00081     std::auto_ptr<CQueuedData> m_curr_tx_data;

00083     // This transfer only
00084     uint32_t m_rx_flags;

00197 
00198     bool WouldBlock() { return InternalGetLastError() == EC_ERROR_WOULDBLOCK; } 
00199     bool GotError() { return InternalGetLastError() != EC_ERROR_NOERROR; } 
00200 
00201     void SocketRead(void* ptr, size_t len) { InternalRead(ptr,len); }
00202     void SocketWrite(const void* ptr, size_t len) { InternalWrite(ptr,len); }
00203     bool SocketError() { return InternalError() && GotError(); }
00204     bool SocketRealError();

00259 class CQueuedData
00260 {
00261     std::vector<unsigned char> m_data;
00262     unsigned char *m_rd_ptr, *m_wr_ptr;
00263 public:
00264     CQueuedData(size_t len)
00265     :
00266     m_data(len)
00267     {
00268         m_rd_ptr = m_wr_ptr = &m_data[0];
00269     }
00270     
00271     ~CQueuedData() {}
00272     
00273     void Rewind()
00274     {
00275         m_rd_ptr = m_wr_ptr = &m_data[0];
00276     }
00277     
00278     void Write(const void *data, size_t len);
00279     void WriteAt(const void *data, size_t len, size_t off);
00280     void Read(void *data, size_t len);
00281 
00282     /*
00283      * Pass pointers to zlib. From now on, no Read() calls are allowed
00284      */
00285     void ToZlib(z_stream &m_z)
00286     {
00287         m_z.avail_in = (uInt)GetUnreadDataLength();
00288         m_z.next_in = m_rd_ptr;
00289     }
00290     
00291     void WriteToSocket(CECSocket *sock);
00292     void ReadFromSocket(CECSocket *sock, size_t len);
00293     
00294     size_t ReadFromSocketAll(CECSocket *sock, size_t len);
00295     
00296     size_t GetLength() const;
00297     size_t GetDataLength() const;
00298     size_t GetRemLength() const;
00299     size_t GetUnreadDataLength() const;
00300 };
